title: Documentation - List of audited components for PA
abstract:
# Documentation - List of audited components for PA
This page contains information about the audited operations of the following Google Distributed Cloud Hosted (GDCH) components:
- [Add-on manager (ADD)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-add) 
- [GKE Identity Service (AIS)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-ais) 
- [Anthos Service Mesh (ASM)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-asm) 
- [Backup and Restore (BACK)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-back) 
- [Database Service (DS)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-ods) 
- [Domain Name System (DNS)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-dns) 
- [Block storage (BLOCK)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-block) 
- [Firewall (FW)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-fw) 
- [Hardware Security Module (HSM)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-hsm) 
- [Identity and Access Management (IAM)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-iam) 
- [Key Management Service (KMS)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-kms) 
- [Logging and Audit Logging (LOG and AL)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-log) 
- [Monitoring (MON)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-mon) 
- [Marketplace (MKT)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-mkt) 
- [Node and operating system (OS)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-os) 
- [Object storage (OBJ)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-object) 
- [Pre-trained AI/ML (VAI)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-vai) 
- [Resource manager (RM)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-rm) 
- [Upper networking (UNET)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-unet) 
- [User cluster (KUB)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-kub) 
- [Virtual Machine Management (VMM)](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/platform-application/pa-ao-operations/audit-vmm
